title: Blockchain Research Analyst
description: At Validation Cloud, we are on a mission to enable elite infrastructure performance for billions of transactions at the intersection of Web3 and commerce.As a Blockchain Research Analyst at Validation, you will be responsible for conducting deep structured research on cutting edge businesses, projects, and protocols in the Web3 ecosystem. Further, you will play a fundamental role in informing Validation’s business development and investment strategies through your analysis and recommendations to the executive management team.
